SEARCH
Package io.papermc.paper.dialog

Interface Dialog

All Superinterfaces:
DialogLike, Keyed, Keyed
@NonExtendable public interface Dialog extends Keyed, DialogLike
Represents a dialog. Can be created during normal server operation via create(Consumer). Can also be created during bootstrap via RegistryEvents.DIALOG.

    • getKey

      @Deprecated(since="1.21.8", forRemoval=true) NamespacedKey getKey()
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      use Registry.getKey(Keyed), RegistryAccess.getRegistry(io.papermc.paper.registry.RegistryKey), and RegistryKey.DIALOG. Dialogs can exist without a key.
      Description copied from interface: Keyed
      Return the namespaced identifier for this object.
